ygData.subject: RE: Nerfing quest components (OT) (was alt.games.everqu est)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes that was a bad choice of terms.  By my own definition I was a newbie until last night:-)  Finally made 23d level after dying at least ten times at 22d
ygData.messageBody:
Yes that was a bad choice of terms. By my own definition I was a newbie
until last night:-) Finally made 23d level after dying at least ten times
at 22d level. I guess the proper phrase to use would be that if Chain
breaks root and Selos no longer does, the new patch has a major negative
impact on anyone less than 23d level.

Galtin of E'ci

> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Oh, wait according to your former post about Chain and root
> I'm a newbie, DOH! Been playing since April 1st and stil a newbie, sigh.
>
> Kitasi the newbie?
>
>
